items.sentence: I'm sorry that I have kept you waiting so long.
I thought that that book was difficult to read.
I don't think that anyone else could do my job.
Tom said it took him three hours to drive here.
The pain was such that I was not able to sleep.
I am slow to adapt myself to new circumstances.
There was a large harvest of peaches last year.
We learned that the moon goes around the earth.
I am acquainted with the chairman of that club.
I came all the way from Boston just to do this.
Tom has to be back in Australia by next Monday.
Can you pick up a case of beer on the way back?
What did you promise Tom that you'd do for him?
Tom graduated from the same school as Mary did.
How could you leave your baby alone in the car?
To tell the truth, I've never thought about it.
It's a pity that Tom should miss such a chance.
My father and my younger sister are carpenters.
That's not our pet rabbit, unless I'm mistaken.
She's no spring chicken. She's at least thirty.
